info: A site where users can buy, sell, and rent properties. It includes features like property listings, user authentication, and a search function.

Fidget Around is a creative, interactive project featuring a collection of playful 3D and visual designs that users can explore to relax, and de-stress. Whether you're looking to take a quick break or simply enjoy mesmerizing interactions.
Modern Collections is a modern e-commerce platform to explore and shop curated 3D visual designs, offering a smooth, stylish, and interactive shopping experience.

An AI-powered app that converts videos into easy-to-read notes. It automatically summarizes key topics from the video, helping users quickly understand and review important points.

An online food ordering platform designed for small-scale restaurants and PGs to sell affordable, home-style meals to customers seeking regular, budget-friendly food options. It connects local food providers with nearby customers for daily, homely meals.

A dedicated app for restaurants and PGs to manage their menus, orders, and deliveries. This platform allows food providers to easily list meals, update prices, track customer orders, and manage sales, helping them reach local customers looking for affordable home-style food.
